subject: Leadership
title: Onboarding New Team Members
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Onboarding New Team Members.

hook.text: A new hire is left alone on day one. No buddy, no guide, no plan. Three months later, she quits.

buildup.text: Onboarding shapes a new member's first impression and belonging. Poor onboarding predicts early turnover.

discovery.text: Effective onboarding goes beyond paperwork: it includes cultural immersion, relationship building, and early wins.

twist.text: The team's role in onboarding matters as much as HR's. Peer connections count more than orientation slideshows.

climax.text: Assign a buddy, schedule intro meetings, set 30-60-90 day goals, and check in weekly. Structure signals care.

punchline.text: First impressions set the trajectory. Make them count.

quiz.question: What predicts early turnover for new team members?
